page.title: 01BROUGHTY FERRY
page.content: Situated on the northern shores of the {Firth of Tay}this predominantly residential suburb of{Dundee}enjoys magnificent views over the{River Tay {to North Fife. Originally a fishing village, the expansion of the{City of Dundee} has swallowed up Broughty Ferry although it is very much an identifiable and individual part of the city. Most of the residents of this area work in{Dundee}and commute by bus or car. Virtually self- supporting with its own shopping centre and necessary amenities, this area is a much sought after residential pocket of{Tayside {Region.} The Tay estuary sees much river traffic to Dundee harbour mainly due to North Sea Oil development.
